We just announced Florida is receiving nearly half a billion dollars in recovery assistance from FEMA!

Return to tradition. Force debate on the most pressing issue facing this country. Pass the SAVE America Act. 
I’M ALL IN 🖐🏻🇺🇸

Ensuring licensed commercial semitruck drivers can read road signs in English just makes sense to ensure safe roadways for Floridians. We must pass my Safer Truckers Act ASAP!

We must continue to combat antisemitism against Jewish students as threats on college campuses around the country have skyrocketed. I met with the @UF Student Government to discuss their efforts back home. https://t.co/jQrQdnQfq6

I am excited to see the U.S. Olympic & Paralympic Committee announce several Floridians are headed to Milano Cortina 2026! Congratulations to our Florida athletes on this achievement. Look forward to you representing our great country and the Sunshine State on the world stage!
